channel.title: Potions reduce too quickly
channel.description:
When I drink a super strength potion, I go to 117 strength and it stays there, until I attack a monster and it drops to 110, then 105, then 99 again. All in three hits, how can I change this? ^ That happens against NPCs
But against players, my strength just stays at 117...

item.title: Potions reduce too quickly
